trends: There has been one other sighting in Littleton
There were no other sightings in Littleton on or around November 18th 2009
divs: Sighting Detailsi was driving home from work on 495 south bound at about 5:15pm. i noticed an odd looking flying object in the shape of a triangle. the object had three (3) dim white lights on the three sides. it seemed to be close, but fading into the clouds, it leads me to believe that it had to have been very high up and large.
Summary: RT 495 sighting of triangular flying object
